release.change: Fix crash when viewing articles without a web link (thanks to azarai).
Holo Reader is now Open Source! If you want to contribute, search for "holoreader" on GitHub or go to the project page directly.
FeedPusher (beta): Easily add feeds to Holo Reader from your desktop computer, just activate it from the menu.
Feed discovery: Add feeds by just providing the website's URL instead of the full feed URL (has to be supported by the website).
Fix crash when resuming activity while feeds are refreshing (Android 4.2 only).
Fix crash when trying to add feeds (invalid Content-type).
Fix crash when trying to add feeds.
Fix crash when refreshing feeds (malformed image URL).
